transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello, this is Jessica from Apex Collections calling for Thomas. Is he available?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you. I'm calling about a debt of $4,100 that you owe. You haven't made a payment in over 90 days.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I know, I've been having financial trouble.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I hear that a lot. But you know what? Other people find a way to pay. Maybe you should get a second job instead of making excuses.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: That's really rude. I've been looking for work.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm just being honest. This debt isn't going away. We can either work out a payment plan or we move to collections. What's it going to be?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We need at least $500 down and then $250 a month. Can you do that or not?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I can probably do $200 a month but I don't have $500 right now.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Then we have a problem. I'll put you down for $200 a month starting next week, but if you miss even one payment, this whole thing goes to our legal team. Understand?
